title: Man charge in shooting death of 15-year-old at Mr. Hero pleads guilty
content:
CLEVELAND HEIGHTS, Ohio - Cleveland Heights man accused of shooting 15-year-old at Mr. Hero pleaded guilty to murder and other charges.
Daveion Perry pleaded guilty in a Wednesday morning court hearing, according to the Cuyahoga County Prosecutor's Office. He is scheduled to be sentenced Friday.
Perry, 20, is charged with aggravated murder, two counts of felonious assault, two counts of aggravated robbery and two counts of kidnapping for the slaying of Sunny Ravi Patel and another robbery.
Patel was found by police with a gunshot wound in the head inside the fast food restaurant.
